data.eml:eml: Leptychaster kerguelenensis (Echinodermata: Asteroidea) from Southwest Atlantic: Redescription and geographic distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Romanelli, Mariela V., Tablado, Alejandro (2011): Leptychaster kerguelenensis (Echinodermata: Asteroidea) from Southwest Atlantic: Redescription and geographic distribution. Zootaxa 2971: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201534
